item.description:
For August, Roger Doiron of the Eat Local Foods Coalition of Maine,is the guest speaker.
http://www.meepi.org/...
He will plan on talking about local foods and achieving greater levels of food self-reliance. Roger is affiliated with the Eat Local Foods Coalition of Maine and Kitchen Gardeners International

Let's try to have a strong turn out for this event, tell your friends.

In other news, the September meeting will involve a screening of "The Power of Community ? How Cuba Survived Peak Oil"
http://www.communitys...
I will be taking donations for the purchase of the Dvd ($20) in August.

Location: Zero Station Gallery, 222 Anderson Street

For more information, see http://www.zerostatio...
item.name: Portland Maine Oil Awareness August Meetup
